Description: Fragment of plain weave with brocading; geometric motifs in beige on dark blue made of a medallion surrounded by dots and containing diamonds and triangular motifs; warp-dark blue wool (Z/9), weft-dark blue wool (S/some paired/8-10), weft brocading in undyed linen (S/grouped by 4); two simple edges are preserved, other edges cut and ragged
Curator's comments: on the textile is another inventory number 37112; textile is preserved with a small bag of loose fibres from conservation; similar to 21534, 90767.6, 90766.5
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
